padcms.magazine.page.elementview

Class MiniArticleElementView

  • java.lang.Object
    • padcms.magazine.page.elementview.BaseElementView
      • padcms.magazine.page.elementview.MiniArticleElementView

  • public class MiniArticleElementView
extends BaseElementView
    mini_article There can be many mini-articles, so it’s multiple field. Each mini article is composed of a PDF / HTML, a Thumbnail illustration used in the sliding scroll band and an optional video file. If a video file is associated with the mini article, it must be launched from PDF using a local://video link. resource (string) relative path to the resource thumbnail (string) relative path to the thumbnail thumbnail_selected (string) relative path to the thumbnail_selected video (string) relative path to the video
